author: Lai Siu Chiu J:
casename: Tan Siok Yee (suing by the committee of the person and estate, Liew Chee Kong) and Others v Chong Voon Kee Ivan
counsel: Muthu Kumaran (Justicius Law Corporation) for the plaintiffs; Gan Seng Chee and Anna Quah (Ang and Partners) for the defendant
